description:
PhotoPrism’s July update includes support for OpenID Connect for simpler, secure logins, enhanced video support, and more.

The post PhotoPrism Bolsters User Access With New Single Sign-On Feature appeared first on Linux Today.
title: PhotoPrism Bolsters User Access With New Single Sign-On Feature

description:
DietPi is a lightweight Debian-based Linux distribution for SBCs and server systems, with the option to install desktop environments, too. It ships as minimal image but allows for the installation of complete and ready-to-use software stacks with a set of console based shell dialogs and scripts. The project released the new version DietPi v9.6 on […]

The post DietPi Released a New Version 9.6 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: DietPi Released a New Version 9.6

description:
AlmaLinux is turning into the RHEL clone with a difference, by patching RHEL security holes that are given a low priority by Red Hat.

The post AlmaLinux Patches Another Security Hole That Red Hat Is Ignoring appeared first on Linux Today.
title: AlmaLinux Patches Another Security Hole That Red Hat Is Ignoring
